attributes.review: This app seriously made me rethinking the greatest america once had under Obama. Our unemployment along with economy has greatly decreased to the point of a possible recession. This app did not give me any reasons what so ever to vote for trump once again. He failed america by presently the rapid increase in COVID cases along with hiding inside a bunker while the BLM movement began. Pathetic.
attributes.title: Trump 2020? No thank you!

attributes.review: this app called tons of birds to my house! It let out a high pitched scream and then i had birds surrounding my house! They popped everywhere until my house was surrounded! My brither thought it was icecream and tried to lick it! he’s now on his death bed and his one wish is to have Barack Obama as president again! please make it come true or he died in vain. 😻👁👄👁🏳️‍🌈✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿❄️🤪yeah❤️
attributes.title: This app caused so much trauma!!

attributes.review: the orange mans little app kept glitching and took 36 weeks to download. nine months. just like him, the app couldn’t function properly when the world needs it ✨ overall, this app is just like him. poorly designed, horrible and overall can’t do their job! remember guys vote Biden 2020, and Trump is a racist pig 🥰🥰😘
attributes.title: horrible and wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.review: This app has so many problems. It is so glitchy all the time and never lets me press any buttons on the home screen. When ever I try to open it, it either shuts down completely or the format of the app is all messed up to the point where I can’t even use it. Don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: When l tried to log in it said that wasn’t a number like who does that and it took like 5 hours or more to download and it wasn’t letting me in so this is a bad app do not use this app it does not work and l am so mad it wasted my time this app is horrible never going to install this app again and l hate this app
attributes.title: It was horrible

attributes.review: The first time I downloaded the app my phone glitched then it exploded everywhere causing a fire on my home then the firefighters came to put out the fire and now I’m homeless and trump isn’t going to pay for the damage that his app caused so now I have a new phone and I would not recommend to download this app it is horrible. 🤬
attributes.title: Horrible app

EVERYONE turned to tiktok. and now the pandemic is coming again in fall and we're just gonna sit around ans twiddle our thumbs? hell no
attributes.title: why this app is fricken trash

attributes.review: Wow can I just say trump is an amazing pedo- I mean president so wanted to download this app to show my support. At first nothing was wrong but after afew days I noticed money from my bank account was missing, so I called my bank and somehow the app got ahold of my credit card info and was making “donations” to trumps campaign. He’s a thief and a liar DONT download this app
attributes.title: He’s a thief

attributes.review: this app almost broke my phone. it took HOURS to download only to glitch and crash every time I opened it, and crashed my whole phone. It’s completely unusable and garbage. If I could give it 0 stars I would. All it did was take up storage and waste my time. Don’t bother wasting yours with this app
attributes.title: don’t download
